act.title: Dialogue Reconstruction
act.intro: Put the sentences below in the correct order. (They are jumbled randomly and appear in a different order everytime you attemp the activity)

item.hanzi: 西方人比较重视什么节日？
item.pinyin: Xīfāng rén bǐjiào zhòngshì shénme jiérì?
Yīnggāi shuō shì Shèngdàn jié ba.

item.hanzi: 人们在圣诞节通常做什么？
item.pinyin: Rénmen zài Shèngdàn jié tōngcháng zuò shénme?

item.hanzi: 通常在那一天，人们会和家人团聚。
item.pinyin: Tōngcháng zài nà yī tiān, rénmen huì hé jiārén tuánjù.

item.hanzi: 哦，和中国人在春节那天同家人团聚一样。
item.pinyin: Ò, hé Zhōngguó rén zài Chūnjié nà tiān tóng jiārén tuánjù yīyàng.
